notes.title: Delegation
notes.content: Q. How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? A. None – It’s a hardware problem

notes.title: Loops
notes.content: How to keep a programmer in the shower forever. Show him the shampoo bottle instructions: Lather. Rinse. Repeat.

notes.title: Arrays
notes.content: Q. Why did the programmer quit his job? A. Because he didn't get arrays.

notes.title: Hardware with software
notes.content: What's the difference between hardware and software? You can hit your hardware with a hammer, but you can only curse at your software.

notes.title: redux
notes.content: A very useful library to manage states!

notes.title: Antd
notes.content: Very powerful UI library based on React

notes.title: React
notes.content: I really love this front-end framework
